AU_MAPPINGTRANSFORMATION.au_xslFile: <?xml version='1.0'?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.1" xmlns:saxonJavaMappingTransformation="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.MappingTransformation" xmlns:saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.support.dbquery.MapperQueryExecutor" xmlns:saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.AggregateFunctionHandler" xmlns:oa="http:/ /www.openapplications.org/oagis" xmlns:str="http://exslt.org/strings" exclude-result-prefixes="saxonJavaMappingTransformation saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler str" xmlns:saxon="http://saxon.sf.net/" extension-element-prefixes="saxon"> <xsl:output method="xml" version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" cdata-section-elements="" indent="yes" /><xsl:param name="_userName"/><xsl:param name="_password"/><xsl:param name="_class"/><xsl:param name="_identifier"/><xsl:param name="_subject"/><xsl:param name="_repositoryPath"/><xsl:param name="_Input1"/> <xsl:variable name="varConn" select="saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor:getInstance($_identifier,'false')"/> <xsl:variable name="apos">'</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="quot">"</xsl:variable><xsl:template name="Drv_XSLTemplate"> <xsl:param name="T1"/> <xsl:param name="T2"/> <!-- template code starts--><xsl:value-of select="$T1+ $T2"/> <!-- template code ends--> </xsl:template><xsl:template match="/"><EmployeeRecord><EmpID><xsl:call-template name="Drv_valueMap"><xsl:with-param name="param" select="Employee/EmployeeID"/></xsl:call-template></EmpID><FName><xsl:value-of select="Employee/FirstName"/></FName><LName><xsl:call-template name="Drv_XSLTemplate"><xsl:with-param name="T1" select="Employee/EmployeeID"/><xsl:with-param name="T2" select="Employee/EmployeeID"/></xsl:call-template></LName><EmpFullName><xsl:value-of select="saxonJavaMapperUtilityClass:invokeREST( 'https://vishugoel.com','GET','','','text/html','' ,'' ,'')" xmlns:saxonJavaMapperUtilityClass="java:MapperUtilityClass"/></EmpFullName><DOB><xsl:value-of select="saxonJavaMappingTransformation:getVariable($_class,'Drv_Variable1','111')"/></DOB><Sex><xsl:value-of select="Employee/Gender"/></Sex><Town><xsl:value-of select="concat( Employee/City,Employee/State)"/></Town></EmployeeRecord></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>
